DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety comparative high dose Tandospirone Citrate treatment patient generalize anxiety disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Tandospirone Citrate Treatment Patients With Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: 1865 year old Male female Diagnosed GAD accord DSMIV HAMA score≥17 Provide write informed consent Agree washedout two week receive SSRI , SNRI NASA . Serious suicidal tendency The score sixth item HAMA ≥3 The score HAMD ≥21 Pregnant lactate woman History allergic hypersensitivity tandospirone Serious unstable cardiac , renal , neurologic , cerebrovascular , metabolic , pulmonary disease Secondary anxiety disorder Drug alcohol dependence within 1 year Patients currently take benzodiazepine drug Drivers dangerous machine operator Participated clinical study last 30 day Patients clinically significant ECG laboratory abnormality Patients history epilepsy Patients abnormal TSH concentration
